text: Companhia de Electricidade de Macau (CEM; ; English: Macau Electricity Company) is an electricity company in Macau, China. Its main business is power generation, power transmission, power distribution and electricity selling in Macau. ==History== CEM was established in 1972 in Portuguese Macau. ==Other websites== *Website *Facebook Category:Electric power companies Category:Macau Category:Electricity
title: Companhia de Electricidade de Macau
